channel.title: GitHub Copilot Changelog
channel.description: Stay up-to-date with new features, improvements, and bug fixes for GitHub Copilot.

item.title: Control AI spending with budget tracking for GitHub AI tools
item.description: <![CDATA[Control AI spending with budget tracking for GitHub AI tools]]>

item.title: GitHub Copilot policy now supports agent mode in the IDE
item.description: <![CDATA[GitHub Copilot policy now supports agent mode in the IDE]]>

item.title: Delegate AI controls management to members of your enterprise
item.description: <![CDATA[Delegate AI controls management to members of your enterprise]]>

item.title: GitHub Copilot policy update for unconfigured policies
item.description: <![CDATA[GitHub Copilot policy update for unconfigured policies]]>

item.title: Copilot coding agent now supports pull request templates
item.description: <![CDATA[Copilot coding agent now supports pull request templates]]>

item.title: Copilot coding agent supports organization custom instructions
item.description: <![CDATA[Copilot coding agent supports organization custom instructions]]>

item.title: The legacy Copilot usage report CSV is no longer available
item.description: <![CDATA[The legacy Copilot usage report CSV is no longer available]]>

item.description: <![CDATA[Raptor mini is rolling out in public preview for GitHub Copilot]]>

item.title: Claude Sonnet 3.5 deprecated, Claude Haiku 4.5 available in Copilot Free
item.description: <![CDATA[Claude Sonnet 3.5 deprecated, Claude Haiku 4.5 available in Copilot Free]]>

item.description: <![CDATA[Auto model selection for Copilot in Visual Studio in public preview]]>

item.title: Copilot code review and coding agent now support agent-specific instructions
item.description: <![CDATA[Copilot code review and coding agent now support agent-specific instructions]]>

item.description: <![CDATA[Manage Copilot coding agent tasks in Visual Studio Code]]>

item.description: <![CDATA[OpenAI’s GPT-5.1, GPT-5.1-Codex and GPT-5.1-Codex-Mini are now in public preview for GitHub Copilot]]>
